name: kaleidoscope shawl
sizes_available: 64" wide x 32" deep at center point (162.5 cm x 81.28 cm)
notes:
elevate your look with this radiant shawl that's ideal for daywear, or dress it up for the evening. red heart boutique unforgettable does all the work as you easily crochet rich and juicy shade transitions. craft it as shown, or take a different color journey to finish a versatile gift for someone special.

shawl is worked flat from the top down with a picot edge and finished shoulder  edge worked seamlessly onto the shawl. 

gauge: 
6 shells = 4" (10 cm): 
9 rows = 4" (10 cm) in shell stitch pattern. 

red heart® boutique unforgettable™: 3 balls
